data.name: Bold Blade Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
It's the soundtrack of Bold Blade, in MP3 and FLAC formats! 8 tracks, making up 5+ minutes of music composed by Jesse Gallagher.
Besides music, if you want to show your support for the development team, you can post your kudos on the community group, gift the game to your friends, and/or you can get this DLC as a small token to us.

Tracklist:


1. Bold Blade - Title Chorus (0:18)
2. Bold Blade - March On (0:10)
3. Bold Blade - Beat Echo (0:48)
4. Bold Blade - Bold Battle (1:54)
5. Bold Blade - Perilous Encounter (0:48)
6. Bold Blade - Bug Boshers (0:34)
7. Bold Blade - Upward Climb (1:16)
8. Bold Blade - Unfortunate End (0:03)

data.short_description: It's the soundtrack of Bold Blade, in MP3 and FLAC formats!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play MP3 or FLAC files

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: one with an mp3 player
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play MP3 or FLAC files

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: one with an mp3 player
  • Processor: 500 Mhz
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Required
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play MP3 or FLAC files
